1     <?php

10    */
11    
12    
13    /**
14    * File containing Graph representation
15    * 
16    * This file contains a class used as representation of a Graph in plot's. It cannot be used independently, it is a requirement of plot.class.php
17    * 
18    * @package WikiPlot
19    * @subpackage PlotClass
20    * @license http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt GNU General Public License
21    * @author WikiPlot development team.
22    * @copyright Copyright 2006, WikiPlot development team.
23    */
24    
25    /**
26    * Representation of a graph
27    * 
28    * Class used to represente graphs on a plot.
29    * 
30    * @package WikiPlot
31    * @subpackage PlotClass
32    * @license http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt GNU General Public License
33    * @author WikiPlot development team.
34    * @copyright Copyright 2006, WikiPlot development team.
35    */
36    class Graph
37    {
38        /**
39        * Label of graph
40        *
41        * This is the label or legend of the graph and will be shown in the corner of the plot, i the graphs color.
42        *
43        *@access public
44        *@var string 
45        */
46        var $Label;
47    
48        /**
49        * Font of the label
50        *
51        * This is the font of the label, defaults to 2, 1-5 are built-in and works as different fontsizes.
52        *
53        *@access public
54        *@var integer 
55        */
56        var $LabelFont = 2;
57    
58        /**
59        * Enable label
60        *
61        * Enable label, defaults to true, draws label if true.
62        *
63        *@access public
64        *@var boolean 
65        */
66        var $EnableLabel = true;
67    
68        /**
69        *Expression
70        *
71        *The mathematical expression representing the graph.
72        *
73        *@see EvalMath::evaluate()
74        *@access public
75        *@var string 
76        */
77        var $Exp;
78    
79        /**
80        * Color of the graph
81        *
82        * Color of the graph and label, array of the RGB representation of the color.
83        * Example: array($Red,$Green,$Blue);
84        *
85        *@access public
86        *@var array 
87        */
88        var $Color = array(0,0,0);
89    
90        /**
91        *Get hash
92        *
93        *Gets a hash of the graphs parameters. Actually is not a hashsum but just all parameter parsed as one string, this is done to reduce collision risk in Plot::GetHash().
94        *
95        *@access private
96        *@return string Hash of all parameters.
97        */
98        function GetHash()
99        {
100           return $this->Label ."_". $this->LabelFont ."_". $this->Exp ."_". $this->Color[0] . "_" . $this->Color[1] . "_" . $this->Color[2] . "_" . $this->EnableLabel;
101       }
102   
103   }
104   ?>
Documentation generated on Fri, 13 Oct 2006 06:44:31 +0200 by phpDocumentor 1.3.0RC3
